appDescription.message: Read the text on the displayed tab

OptionsPageSampleTextValue.message: If I speak in the tongues of men or of angels, but do not have love, I am only a resounding gong or a clanging cymbal.

OptionsPageIsScrollEnabledText.message: Enable force scroll to speech sentence

OptionsPageScrollPositionRatioTitle.message: Vertical position on the screen when forcibly scrolling

OptionsPageIsAutopageizeContinueEnabledT.message: Experimental feature: If what is read aloud when it is finished reading, it reads out the added content. (You may be glad when you match it with Autopagerize. Please note that there are various uncertainties in this function at present, so it can not be stable operation)

OptionsPageConvertTableURLLinkText.message: Reading database (link to Wedata JSON format)

OptionsPageRegexpConvertTableURLLinkText.message: Regular expression replacement database (link to Wedata JSON format)

OptionsPageDonateText.message: You can support TabSpeech by donating:

OptionsPageIsRateMaxStrechTextWarning.message: Some speakers may not be able to read aloud if a certain speed is set, or the speed setting may be ignored.Therefore, after turning this option ON, always perform a reading test and confirm that reading is performed as intended. please.

OptionsPageAnnounceMessage.message: Of the following settings, set the Speaker part to the appropriate language and speaker, use "Test" to check if you can speak, and then press "Save" to save the settings. TabSpeech will not work if at least that is not done.

OptionsPageIsStartSpeechClickEnabled.message: Start reading by clicking two buttons (pressing at the same time)

OptionsPageIsStopSpeechClickEnabled.message: Stop reading by clicking two buttons (pressing at the same time)
